headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About Hubbell (HUBB) Q4 Earnings
summary: The headline numbers for Hubbell (HUBB) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended December 2024, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: Hubbell (HUBB) Beats Q4 Earnings Estimates
summary: Hubbell (HUBB) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 1.99% and 4.54%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Hubbell: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results topped Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of five analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $4.02 per share. The electrical products manufacturer posted revenue of $1.33 billion in the period, missing Street forecasts.

raw.headline: Hubbell: Q4 Earnings Snapshot

headline: Hubbell (NYSE:HUBB) Reports Sales Below Analyst Estimates In Q4 Earnings
summary: Electrical and electronic products company Hubbell (NYSE:HUBB) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2024, with sales flat year on year at $1.33 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $4.10 per share was 2.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Hubbell Reports Fourth Quarter 2024 and Full Year Results
summary: Shelton, CT, Feb. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HUBBELL REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2024 AND FULL YEAR RESULTS Q4 diluted EPS of $3.64; adjusted diluted EPS of $4.10 (up 11% y/y)Q4 net sales -1% (organic -3%; net M&A +3%)Q4 operating margin 19.3%; adjusted operating margin 21.8% (up 240bps y/y)FY 2024 diluted EPS of $14.37; adjusted diluted EPS of $16.57FY 2025 diluted EPS expected range of $16.00-$16.50; adj. diluted EPS of $17.35-$17.85 SHELTON, CT.
